column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of my favorite restaurants in Chicago. Tapas are perfect when sharing plates with a large group of people. You can't go wrong with any of the tapas but my faves are the goat cheese dip
column3: and the croquettes! They also have brunch on the weekends with a great selection of brunch tapas! Also their sangria pitchers are amazing
column4: passion fruit flavor is the best by far!
